text.__SUMMARY__:
Philodendron gloriosum is a species of plant in the family Araceae, genus Philodendron. It is a crawling, terrestrial plant, native to Colombia whose foliage is characterized by cordate (heart-shaped) by a velutionous surface, pink margins, and pale green, white, or pinkish veins. A full botanical description can be found at e-Monocot.org.
